alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 01 at 9:27AM EDT until further notice by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of New Hampshire Lakes Region, including the following counties, Belknap, Merrimack, Strafford, Carroll, Grafton, and Rockingham. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along small streams and creeks. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 925 AM EDT, Local law enforcement reported minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rochester, Laconia, Franklin, Moultonborough, Meredith, Ossipee, Northwood, Farmington, Loudon and Alton.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
